name: Fit Flat (Milion16)
description:
Fit Flat

Welcome to the neighborhood!! Are you ready for Fit Flat? 

In this building your neighbors are crazy about work at home! Choose your character, the intensity level and play! Overcome each challenge of your neighbors until you reach the top, achieving the highest score. Let's do some exercise!

What is Fit Flat?

Fit Flat is an educational game made to encourage and teach people to do exercise in their own homes. 

With that in mind, we gathered a group of various game developers and a personal trainer in order to achieve that goal. 

How do you Play?

You only have to select a character and difficulty and start learning how to do each exercise with the description and examples shown. 

You have to join your character and neighbors in doing the chosen exercise until the clock has reached zero and answer a question now and then to value how well you are doing it. 

Made by DigitalDev
  • Aleix Azulea
  • Francesc Balsells 
  • Martí de Ferrer 
  • Joel Mateu  
  • Michael Miranda
